Validation_Errors.PASSWORD_REGEX: Invalid password format. It must contain at least one digit, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one special character, and be between 8 and 25 characters long.
Validation_Errors.USERNAME_REGEX: Invalid username format. It must contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and Arabic characters, with a length between 3 and 30 characters.
Validation_Errors.ARRAY_POSITIVE: Must be an array and contain positive numbers
Validation_Errors.INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER: The value must be a valid phone number
Validation_Errors.ARRAY_MUST_BE_ARRAY: The value must be an array
Validation_Errors.ARRAY_STRING: The value must be an array of strings
